markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Summon Entity](/Spells.aspx?ID=321)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 375 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Nyarlathotep (Haunter in the Dark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=222), [Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos)](/Deities.aspx?ID=164)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure an aberration to fight for you. This works like [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316), except you summon a common creature that has the [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) trait and whose level is 5 or lower, such as those below.

---
**Heightened (6th)** Level 7.

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9.

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11.

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13.

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15.
name: Summon Entity

This works like summon animal , except you summon a common creature that has the aberration trait and whose level is 5 or lower, such as those below. --- Heightened (6th) Level 7.
